article_title: Chinese Hunt for Oil in Brazilian Deep
article_text:
Two of China's largest energy companies have joined an international consortium to develop Brazil's largest offshore oil discovery, marking a significant step in Chinese efforts to develop deep-water technologies that could be used to exploit oil and natural gas in its own territory.

The agreement, which is also a rare example of China's state oil groups working together on an international project, comes two weeks after the country invited foreign companies to bid for exploration and production rights in 25 deep-water...

twitter.description: Cnooc Ltd. and China National Petroleum Corp. have joined a five-member international consortium to develop Brazil's largest offshore oil discovery, the Libra oil field.
twitter.title: Chinese Hunt for Oil in Brazilian Deep

image.alt: China's Cnooc and CNPC are part of a global group working Brazil's top offshore oil find.
